task.title: Setting the local directory
task.shortdesc: When the FTP connection is established, the local files list will automatically display the contents of the local directory specified on the Advanced tab.

taskbody.context: Use the Default local directory: field to specify the starting local directory.

step.cmd: In the Servertype field, select Default (Autodetect).
step.info: Even if you know your particular server type, it is better to choose Default (Autodetect) in case the server type changes during the life of the project.

step.cmd: In the Default local directory: field, enter (or browse for) the name of the local directory used to store temporary data.

info.note: Never enter your password when connecting to an FTP site from within the corporate firewall.

taskbody.result: When the FTP connection is next established, the local files list will default to the directory name entered.
